Tutorial¶

  1. Begin by registering a new account by clicking “Sign Up.”

  2. After filling out the fields, log in using the “Log In” link.

  3. Once logged in, use the basic split function by clicking on “Basic Split.”

  4. In the top field, enter the total amount of money to be paid.

  5. In the bottom field, enter the number of people the money is to be split amongst.

  6. Once finished, click the “Submit” button.

  7. To return to the Home page, click “Back”
